description: NonResourceRule holds information that describes a rule for the non-resource

nonResourceURLs.description: A set of partial urls that a user should have access to. Wildcards ('*') are allowed, but only as the full, final step in the path. '*' means all.

verbs.description: Verb is a list of kubernetes non-resource API verbs, like: get, post, put, delete, patch, head, options. '*' means all.
